FuncDef:
The l3 command configures a load balancing mode for Layer 3 packets.
The undo l3 command deletes the specified load balancing mode of Layer 3 packets or restores the default load balancing mode of Layer 3 packets. The l3 command configures a load balancing mode for Layer 3 packets. The undo l3 command deletes the specified load balancing mode of Layer 3 packets or restores the default load balancing mode of Layer 3 packets. By default, Layer 3 packets on internal communication interfaces are load balanced based on sbsp, src-ip, dst-ip, src-port, and dst-port. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H and CE6881H-K.
CLIs: l3 { sbsp | outer-vlan | inner-vlan | src-ip | dst-ip | protocol | src-port | dst-port }
undo l3 [ sbsp | outer-vlan | inner-vlan | src-ip | dst-ip | protocol | src-port | dst-port ]
